meta.title: Web Development Outsourcing
meta.description: CSSSR is a front-end web development group that major on outsource front-end development services for a wide range of industries. We bring logic to the world with JavaScript.

hero.title:
Web Development
Outsourcing
hero.description: CSSSR group specializes in outsource front-end web development for a wide range of industries. We have created more than 500 successful projects so our experience always helps us to choose the right way whatever task we are assigned with.

aboutFrontend.title: Front-End Development
aboutFrontend.subtitle: We develop complex solutions for websites and web applications using JavaScript.
aboutFrontend.description: User experiences primarily depend on how well the front-end of the product is made. Original design and ideas must look perfect across all major browsers, platforms and devices, as well as being accessible to most users and performing well.

benefits.title: Reliable Outsourcing
benefits.description: By entrusting web development tasks to a reliable contractor, you can significantly accelerate your business development and reduce costs.

list.title: Quick start
list.description: By outsourcing your projects, you get access to a ready-built team immediately, without the exhausting process of hiring an in-house team.

list.title: Cost Savings
list.description: With a remote team, you can save money on hiring, office space, developing processes and motivating your employees.

list.title: External Expertise
list.description: We can provide you with a wide range of specialists with various qualifications, including rare expertise.

list.title: Flexibility
list.description: Outsourced teams are easily adjusted, with the potential to quickly change in size and structure, giving you long-term convenience and security.

list.title: Single-Page Apps
list.description: SPAs render pages directly in browsers, prevent server overload, and feel much faster and more responsive to users.

list.title: Progressive Web Apps
list.description: PWAs provide features that give them the same user experience advantages as native apps. They are fast, integrated, reliable, and engaging.

list.title: Real-Time Web Apps
list.description: Such apps provide real-time information transfer between users and from users to servers. It can be messengers, newsfeeds, dashboards, etc.

list.title: API Integration
list.description: API integration is necessary for building a strong network of data across different services, including third-party apps.

list.title: Stack Migration
list.description: Sometimes it is necessary to migrate an entire project from inefficient and outdated technologies to modern ones. We can guide the process smoothly and without downtime.

list.title: Consulting
list.description: We’re happy to offer technical consulting advice on all matters related to our expertise.

contactUs.title: Already Have an Idea?
contactUs.subtitle: Tell us about your project and we’ll find a solution.

technologyStack.title: Technology Stack
technologyStack.subtitle: For most projects we use React, Angular and Vue.
description: Our proficiency in a wide range of front-end technologies helps us choose the right tools and libraries based on clients’ requirements and our expertise.
We can also pair your front-end with back-end technologies to provide a complete end-to-end solution.

advantages.title: Well-Designed Processes
advantages.description: We work completely remotely and have built remote processes, which we are extremely proud of. We work with Agile methodologies and have taken the best from various approaches. Therefore, it is simple for us to adapt our team size and ways of working to your needs.

advantages.title: Specialization
advantages.description: We’ve focused on the narrow niche of front-end development, which has allowed us to achieve the highest level of expertise through over 500 projects.

advantages.title: Long-Term Relationship
advantages.description: We can complete short-term tasks over just a few months, or we can stay on a project for years, developing and supporting it with a permanent team.

Outsourced teams are easy to adjust.
